location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 128 to Jaffer Khan from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter acknowledges receipt of a letter (via Saffir Beg) from Jaffer Khan (IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 154-155). The letter thanks Jaffer Khan for ensuring John Morrison and John Bigge's safe passage to Bushire but states that Galley has no knowledge of their mission or intentions and that if they had been sent by the Government in England or the Company he would have been informed.
